innerHTML:
My bookmark blog Design Heroes has built quite a following over the last few years — who said RSS was dead? — but being more active on Twitter (@dbushell) has made this blog redundant (and a pain to maintain).

Design Heroes was my “original” web project so I’ve been hesitant to let it die but lack of time has inevitably seen that happen anyway! It was a great website to experiment with, the first one I ever built with “HTML5”. I’ll keep it online as an archive and post/tweet further resources from now on. I have a few ideas to present those tweets beyond the fire hose too. While those ideas are in the think factory I’m using ThinkUp to own my data. Don’t expect it back from Twitter anytime soon!

So thanks to everyone who supported Design Heroes, make sure to follow me on Twitter for further bookmarks!
